description: The States of Guernsey is hosting a free webinar on Friday for business owners.
title: Guernsey businesses to find out more about ferry freight service
title_page: Guernsey businesses to find out more about ferry freight service - BBC News
maintext:
Business owners in Guernsey will have the opportunity to find out how they can benefit from importing and exporting directly to France.
The States is hosting a free webinar on Friday with senior members from Brittany Ferries and the Guernsey Chamber of Commerce.
The event will share information about the opportunities and requirements of importing and exporting via the new ferry service, which is due to begin at the end of March.
Chris Morris, the States' head of international trade, said the new schedule "could be a real game changer" for some firms due to its "more consistent timetable".
